name: try hof
onCreateCommand:
# install hof
wget https://github.com/hofstadter-io/hof/releases/download/v0.6.8-beta.5/hof_0.6.8-beta.5_Linux_x86_64 -O hof
chmod +x hof
sudo mv hof /usr/local/bin/hof

# install cue
wget https://github.com/cue-lang/cue/releases/download/v0.5.0-beta.5/cue_v0.5.0-beta.5_linux_amd64 -O cue
chmod +x cue
sudo mv cue /usr/local/bin/cue
